DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study quantify effect multiple dose PF-04531083 pharmacokinetics ( PK ) co-administered single dose simvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: To Explore The Potential For PF-04531083 To Effect The Blood Concentrations Of Simvastatin And Its Main Acid Metabolite Following Co-Administration Of Both Medications
DOC.detailed_description: observational- quantify effect PF_04531083 PK Simvastatin
DOC.criteria: young healthy male female volunteer Elderly Patients
